{{cpp/title|layout_left}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=mdspan|since=c++23|
struct layout_left;
}}

{{tt|layout_left}} is a {{named req|LayoutMappingPolicy}} which provides a layout mapping where the leftmost extent has stride 1, and strides increase left-to-right as the product of extents.

{{rev begin}}
{{rev|until=c++26|
{{tt|layout_left}} is a {{named req|TrivialType}}.
}}
{{rev|since=c++26|
{{tt|layout_left}} is {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}}, and {{c|std::is_trivially_default_constructible_v&lt;layout_left&gt;}} is {{c|true}}.
}}
{{rev end}}
